title: USB Device Not Recognized
description: Fix USB devices not being detected or recognized by computer.

steps.title: Try Different USB Port
steps.instruction: Unplug the device and try a different USB port on your computer. Try both front and back ports if using a desktop.

steps.title: Restart Computer with Device Connected
steps.instruction: Leave the USB device plugged in and restart your computer. Sometimes the device is detected during boot.

steps.title: Check Device Manager
steps.instruction: Open Device Manager → Look for devices with yellow exclamation marks → Right-click → Uninstall device → Unplug and replug USB device.

steps.title: Update USB Controllers
steps.instruction: Device Manager → Universal Serial Bus controllers → Right-click each USB controller → Update driver.

steps.title: Test Device on Another Computer
steps.instruction: Try the USB device on a different computer to check if the issue is with the device or your computer's USB ports.
